input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Taylor Stitch"
Reference Product Name: "The Chore Pant"
Reference Product Description:
The Chore Pant in Aged Penny Chipped Canvas from Taylor Stitch 12.5-oz. 100% organic cotton canvas. 6-oz. 100% organic cotton SF Map pocketing. Stone washed for a worn in look and feel. Angled front slash pockets for easy entry. Two half-lined back patch pockets. Signature double-knee reinforced construction. Pen sleeve on both front panels. Front and back pockets bar-tacked at stress points. Button fly closure. Double-needle construction throughout. Wash cold and tumble dry low. Made in China.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Flint and Tinder Men's 365 Pant - HB Athletic Tapered in Washed Black, Size 30 x 32, Cotton'
  - Name='Dickies Men's Multi-Pocket Utility Work Pants'
  - Name='Flint and Tinder Men's 365 Cotton Chino Pants'
  - Name='Flint and Tinder Men's 365 Pant - HB Athletic Tapered in Earth, Size 38 x 34, Cotton'
  - Name='Levi's 569 Loose Straight Fit Men's Jeans'
  - Name='Levi's Men's 502 Taper Fit Linen+ Jeans'
  - Name='Alex Mill Men's Herringbone Cotton Pants'
  - Name='Levi's Men's 541 Athletic Taper Pants'
  - Name='511 Slim Fit Levi's Men's Jeans'
  - Name='Levi's Men's 541 Athletic Fit Taper Jeans'
  - Name='Everlane Men's The Performance 5 Pocket Pants'
  - Name='UNIQLO Men's Linen Blend Tall Pants'
  - Name='Bonobos Men's Slim Performance Link 5-Pocket Pants'
  - Name='Men Bonobos Stretch Weekday Warrior Slim Fit Dress Pants'
  - Name='Bonobos Men's Athletic Fit Weekday Warrior Dress Pants'
  - Name='Patagonia Men's Torrentshell 3L Rain Pants'
  - Name='Taylor Stitch Double Knee The Chore Pant'
  - Name='Carhartt WIP Sid Pant'
  - Name='Carhartt WIP OG Single Knee Pant in Smithtown Denim'
  - Name='Women Carhartt WIP Womenâ€™s Drewe Pant'
  - Name='Taylor Stitch Men's Organic Cotton Slim Jean'
  - Name='Carhartt WIP Double Knee Pant'
  - Name='UNIQLO Men's Straight Chino Pants'
  - Name='UNIQLO Men's Tall Smart Ankle Pants'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Performance Chino Pants'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Flint and Tinder Men's 365 Pant - HB Athletic Tapered in Washed Black, Size 30 x 32, Cotton
scores_with_rationales.rationale: These are cotton pants with an athletic tapered fit, similar casual workwear and fabric cotton content, matching the functional and material profile closely to the Chore Pant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Dickies Men's Multi-Pocket Utility Work Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Utility work pants with multiple pockets align strongly with the Chore Pant's workwear function, reinforced construction, and durable design.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Flint and Tinder Men's 365 Cotton Chino Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cotton chinos from a related brand, similar material and use but chino style is less rugged and fewer workwear features than chore pants.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Flint and Tinder Men's 365 Pant - HB Athletic Tapered in Earth, Size 38 x 34, Cotton
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same model as other Flint and Tinder 365 pant but different size and color, similar cotton construction and athletic tapered fit matching the functional style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Levi's 569 Loose Straight Fit Men's Jeans
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Jeans with loose straight fit differ in fabric from cotton canvas and construction; denim differs significantly from chore pant fabric and style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Levi's Men's 502 Taper Fit Linen+ Jeans
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Tapered fit jeans with linen blend; fabric and style differ more from heavy cotton canvas chore pant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Alex Mill Men's Herringbone Cotton Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cotton pants with herringbone weave, somewhat comparable fabric quality but less heavy-duty construction and design for workwear.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Levi's Men's 541 Athletic Taper Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Athletic tapered jeans but denim material differs, less emphasis on utility features and double knees.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 511 Slim Fit Levi's Men's Jeans
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit jeans mainly denim, differing in material and intended use from chore pant workwear cotton.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Levi's Men's 541 Athletic Fit Taper Jeans
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Athletic fit tapered jeans; denim fabric contrasts with chore pant construction and fabric.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Men's The Performance 5 Pocket Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Performance fabric pants with 5 pockets, casual utilitarian style. Similar in function but possibly lighter weight fabric.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: UNIQLO Men's Linen Blend Tall Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Linen blend material and likely dressier style far from heavy cotton workwear construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bonobos Men's Slim Performance Link 5-Pocket Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit casual pants with performance fabric and 5 pockets, somewhat functional but less rugged build than chore pant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men Bonobos Stretch Weekday Warrior Slim Fit Dress Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Dress pants with stretch fabric focus, different purpose and fabric from chore pant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bonobos Men's Athletic Fit Weekday Warrior Dress Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Dress pants with athletic cut, intended for office wear rather than robust workwear.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Patagonia Men's Torrentshell 3L Rain Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Rain pants with waterproof 3-layer fabric, entirely different purpose, fit, and construction from chore pant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Taylor Stitch Double Knee The Chore Pant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Identical product from the same brand with double knee reinforcement exactly matching the reference chore pant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Carhartt WIP Sid Pant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Carhartt workwear-inspired pant, likely durable fabric with functional design features but differing style and fabric weight.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Carhartt WIP OG Single Knee Pant in Smithtown Denim
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Work pants with denim fabric and single knee reinforcement, similar in function but different material and silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Women Carhartt WIP Womenâ€™s Drewe Pant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Womenâ€™s style work pants, likely smaller fit and possibly different construction and silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Taylor Stitch Men's Organic Cotton Slim Jean
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim organic cotton jeans from the same brand, but jean style differs from chore pant construction and utility focus.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Carhartt WIP Double Knee Pant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Double knee work pants from another workwear brand, similar construction and purpose though fabric and fit may differ.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: UNIQLO Men's Straight Chino Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Straight chinos with cotton fabric, but typically lighter weight and less reinforced than chore pant canvas.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: UNIQLO Men's Tall Smart Ankle Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Stylish dress/casual smart pants, lighter fabric and different design purpose than chore pant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Men's Performance Chino Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Performance fabric chinos with casual utility features, somewhat closer to chore pant utility but lighter fabric and less rugged construction.
